name: Solactron, Inc.
description: Operator of a solar technology company intended to deliver improved thin film solar modules for the multi-trillion dollar electricity generation market. The company's technology develops thin-film solar photovoltaic panels using the CIGS material system and delivers monolithically integrated solar modules on glass substrates with improved efficiency and reasonable cost at a gigawatt scale, enabling clients to use green energy and keep the environment clean around them.
one_liner: Operator of a solar technology company intended to deliver improved thin film solar modules for the multi-trillion dollar electricity generation market. The company's technology develops thin-film solar photovoltaic panels using the CIGS material system and delivers monolithically integrated solar modules on glass substrates with improved efficiency and reasonable cost at a gigawatt scale, enabling clients to use green energy and keep the environment clean around them.
